msg: Few corrections in security-ldap.xml and replication code.

author: felixk
msg: As discussed in http://www.archivum.info/dev@directory.apache.org/2008-10/msg00010.html we try to create a fastbuild (don't create existing *help modules again).
To run fast build add -Dfastbuild to your CLI:
The build will fail if running -Dfastbuild without existing *help modules or
will download them from the snapshot server without building them!
